channel.title: The Domino Diaries on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in The Domino Diaries on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Dinoland
item.description:
Welcome to the devlog (“developer diary”) for my game Dinoland.

This article describes the whole process of creating this game, moving through the different versions, what problems I faced and why I made certain decisions. Hopefully it’s interesting and fun to read!

item.title: Domino Dynasty
item.description:

item.title: The Domino Diaries
item.description:
Welcome to the devlog (“developer diary”) for my collection of games I dubbed The Domino Diaries

This article describes the general approach to the collection, quite briefly. It’s an overview/general project devlog. Each game received its own individual devlog for more details.
